subtasks.description: Create Pub/Sub subscriber for raw xAPI data archival
Implement Cloud Storage integration for raw JSON payloads
Add monitoring endpoints for storage subscriber health

completion_criteria: Pub/Sub subscriber receives messages from Cloud Function
Raw xAPI JSON payloads stored in Cloud Storage with proper naming
Monitoring endpoints show subscriber health and storage metrics

real_world_testing.notes: Requires Pub/Sub topic and Cloud Storage bucket setup
real_world_testing.test_environment: Google Cloud Pub/Sub + Cloud Storage integration

agent_handoff.handoff_notes: Pub/Sub storage subscriber implemented and ready for testing
